mapper.select: SELECT LEVEL , CD.CODE_NO AS ID , CD.CODE_VAL AS CODE , CD.CODE_NAME AS TEXT , CASE WHEN CD.CODE_NO = 0 THEN '#' ELSE TO_CHAR(CD.UPPER_CODE_NO) END PARENT , CD.CODE_SORT AS SORT_ORDR , CD.USE_YN AS USE_AT , CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CODE WHERE UPPER_CODE_NO = CD.CODE_NO) = 0 THEN '/images/lgs/code.png' ELSE '/images/lgs/file.png' END AS ICON FROM CODE CD START WITH CD.CODE_NO = 0 CONNECT BY PRIOR CD.CODE_NO = CD.UPPER_CODE_NO ORDER SIBLINGS BY CD.CODE_SORT
SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM CODE
